hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that:A man came from Najran to the Messenger of Allah [SAW]. He was wearing a gold ring, and the Messenger of Allah [SAW] turned away from him, and said: "You have come to me with a coal of fire on your hand

chapter.ara-name: باب حَدِيثِ أَبِي هُرَيْرَةَ وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى قَتَادَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Hadith of Abu Hurairah and the Differences Reported from Qatadah
